mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_BBS(SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, RDATE, TYPE, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_CS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1, 0) FROM CS_BBS), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{type}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE CS_BBS SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE REF = (SELECT REF FROM CS_BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq} ) AND STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM CS_BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_BBS(SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, TITLE, CONTENT, RDATE, TYPE, DEL, USERID ) VALUES(SEQ_CS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT REF FROM CS_BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM CS_BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM CS_BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1,0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{userid})
